content: Answered my own question. Its says in the finer print the resources are not updated.

How do you use http://jamesagnew.github.io/hapi-fhir/ to understand how FHIR works?
How does the download process work?
Screenshot_1.png
@morgana de cássia oliveira ribeiro Maven and Gradle are pretty common mechanisms for distributing Java libraries. Have you tried googling them?

Hi. Wisdom tells me that there is some feature present on the official website that is similar in representation to a Blood Exam ? I'm doing an analysis of a scenario that needs this kind of resource.
Hi, i want to know, if there is way to auto parse HL7 messeages to an CCDA file or FHIR ( json or XML ) file. Please Help
CCDA and FHIR are also HL7. I presume you mean converting HL7 v2 to C-CDA or FHIR?

If so, the answer is for C-CDA is "no". The answer for FHIR is "we're working on a base set of theoretical transforms, but you'll always have to adjust them to reflect the variations of the particular v2 system. (v2 implementations have quite a bit of variability.)
